subject: FROM THE SUPREME COURT OF FLOR
body:
FROM THE SUPREME COURT OF FLORIDA,UNITED STATES.
Dear customer,
I am Chief Judge,Supreme Court of Florida,We the Supreme Court of
Florida write this today to announce to you that the total sum of
$1,350,000 USA Dollars is under our Care for Security purpose.
which Mrs Doris Woolwine stated that you assigned her to received as
your next kin due to you were on sick bed 
so she sent a power of
attorney stated that you are on a chronic sick bed because of a fatal
accident 
you had and made a request that you authorized her to
received your funds.here are the address tendered to us below:
9009 SE Causey Ave Apt G 34
Happy Valley, Oregon 97086 USA
You really have to stop dealing with those people that are contacting
you and telling you that your fund is with them, it is not in anyway
with them, they are only taking advantage of you and they will dry you
up until you have nothing left.
We will advised you to purchase Us$100 Steam wallet card or Us$100 iTunes gift
card and send it today or within 48 hours so that we will redeem it to
cash and you will get your ATM Master Card.
N\B: Never you reply this message if you are not willing \Ready to pay
the required fee of $100.
please get back to us immediately if you are not aware of this request
with your delivery information: 1.Your Full Name: 2. Address Where You
want us to your ATM Master Card! 3. Cell/Mobile Number: 4. 
Your ID
.
we
strive to ensure that you will always receive a prompt and courteous
attention.
Yours in Services
Chief Justice Carlos G. Mu√±iz
Email:fofficefiless@gmail.com

subject: Re: FROM THE SUPREME COURT OF FLOR
body:
Dear Chief Justice Carlos G. Muiz,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the total sum of USA Dollars that is under your care for security purposes. I appreciate you taking the time to inform me about this matter.

I must admit, I am a bit confused about the involvement of Mrs. Doris Woolwine in all of this. Could you please provide more details about her role and why she claims to be authorized to receive the funds on my behalf? Additionally, could you clarify how my chronic illness and a fatal accident are related to this situation?

Furthermore, I would like to understand why you believe other people who have contacted me regarding my funds are not trustworthy. It's important for me to have a clear understanding of who I should trust in this matter.

Regarding the purchase of US Steam wallet cards or US gift cards, could you explain why these specific items are required? How will they be used to redeem cash and facilitate the delivery of my ATM Master Card?

Lastly, I would appreciate it if you could provide more information about the fees involved in this process. It would be helpful for me to know what exactly these fees cover and how they contribute to ensuring a smooth transaction.

Thank you once again for your assistance and prompt attention. I look forward to receiving your response.

Best wishes,
Tina
